name: Anurag Choudhary
about: Versatile Full Stack Developer adept in Java, Spring Boot, ASP.NET for backend, and React, Angular for frontend development. Demonstrates exceptional problem-solving and teamwork skills. experience.description: As an Associate Software Engineer at BPK Technologies, Lucknow, I work with technologies such as ASP.NET Web API, Angular, and Azure, contributing to the development of dentistry-related applications. My responsibilities involve crafting efficient and scalable solutions, optimizing web services, and collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software tailored to the needs of the dental industry.
